citation.article-title: Sneathiella glossodoripedis sp. nov., a marine alphaproteobacterium isolated from the nudibranch Glossodoris cincta, and proposal of Sneathiellales ord. nov. and Sneathiellaceae fam. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Sneathiellales (Snea.thi.el.laâ€²les. N.L. fem. n. Sneathiella type genus of the order; -ales ending to denote an order; N.L. fem. n. Sneathiellales the order of Sneathiella).
Segregation of these organisms into a new order is justified by their distinct phyletic lineage based on the 16S rRNA gene.
